1.title: Triple Play

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's 3 in the Bag (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: Rachael Ray turns a bag of groceries and a few pantry staples into three delicious meals. This 3-pack includes Chickpea and Potato Soup, Crispy Curry "Cutlet" Sandwiches, and Spinach Tagliatelle with Buttery Tomato Sauce.

2.title: Three for the Money

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's 3 in the Bag (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: These three meals save you time at the supermarket and in the kitchen. Rachael Ray gets double duty out of a whole poached chicken with Lemon Chicken and Leek Rice Pilaf, Linguini with Kale Pesto and Chicken Suiza Chilaquiles.

3.title: The Best Things in Life Are Three

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's 3 in the Bag (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Recipes include: a paprika flank steak with watercress and blue cheese; "chicken in a sack"; Tex-Mex tomato soup and grilled cheese.

4.title: Three Cuisines in One Bag

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's 3 in the Bag (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: This time-saving menu is an international tour for the tastebuds. It starts with Chorizo Stew with Kale, then it's Teriyaki Chicken with Soba and for the third meal; Moroccan Red Harissa Chicken.

5.title: Gluten-Free Times Three

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's 3 in the Bag (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: With more asking for gluten-free recipes, Racheal Ray's come up with 3 meals that don't sacrifice flavor. In the bag: Sweet 'n' Spicy Shrimp Lettuce Tacos, Zucchini Pappardelle with Pesto and Eggplant Alla Norma and Poblano Posole

6.title: Three Times the Flavor

episode of.title: Rachael Ray's 3 in the Bag (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: It's a time-saving menu big on flavor, thanks to a couple of Racheal Ray's marinades and rub. In the bag: Lemon Pepper Cured Chicken with Fennel Salad, Eggplant Schnitzel and Roasted Peppers and Espresso Steak with Baked Zucchini.

imdb.title: Rachael Ray's 3 in the Bag
akas: Rachael Ray's 3 in the Bag (United States)
plot: Rachael Ray turns one bag of groceries into three different meals.::anonymous
